statements: DELETE FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE fuel_economy < 30 AND manufacturer = 'Toyota';
DELETE FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND manufacturer = 'Toyota'
DELETE FROM fuel_efficiency_data WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric' AND fuel_economy > 30
DELETE FROM fuel_efficiency WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND date = '2022-09-01';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year = 2018;
DELETE FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 50 AND trip_id = 200;
DELETE FROM fuel_prices WHERE fuel_type_id = 2 AND price_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM fuel_records WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND fuel_cost > 50
